Instructions:

1- Get this torrent
2- Install the software FreeArc-0.666-win32.[If already have no need to install]
   [Though its a Freeware added it for convenience] 
3- Extract the archive Win7.AIO.SP1.x64.March2014.arc with it.
4- Extract the ISO
4- Burn it using Nero or ISO burner or any other programme in DVD 9 [Dual Layer DVD] to make a bootable disc.
5- Or make a bootable USB pen drive using Windows 7 USB DVD Download Tool [Included along with this]
6- Install [I think no need to describe it]

Notes: Disable your AVs
